A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I honestly don't know where to begin. It took a while to sink in\, and I'm still processing what it was that I sat through today. It wasn't a Star Wars movie. I suppose the overarching thing was that I didn't feel like I was in the Star Wars universe that I am used to. I mean\, there was a scene in this movie with people walking around in TUXEDO's for crying out loud. The villains were either buffoons or emo. They certainly weren't a real threat to anything. I could honestly go on and on and on. Not to be overly dramatic\, but I feel like Star Wars was ruined for me today. The history and lore destroyed.  I might as well have sat through an Avengers movie.
